Name: Red dust
About the game: Red dust - hardcore first person shooter with randomly generated world. Game was created under the inspiration of 'Receiver'. Save the citizens from invaders! Get to the center of the station and take control of it. Move slowly, shoot accurately, don`t lower guard. Mistakes are expensive. Collect ammo, body details, and red dust - energy resource, which can repair and upgrade your body, this is your health and cash in this world. Key Features -random generated world 1 km x 1 km -different types of cartridges -guns with unique features and different characteristics -detailed guns mechanic -different types of aims
